cells.data:
(1)What do you think about wayfair
You know, Wayfair is one of the good growing e-commerce companies every year. As a fresher every one wish to join in such reputed company. According to my view wayfair provides a great opportunity for me in order to gain practical knowledge and good environment.I am truly passionate about the work wayfair provide.

I really like wayfair’s company culture ,I notice that the culture said wayfair offer employees exciting work in a fun, dynamic environment that encourages learning and growth,  I also notice several core values like  Use the Brains ,Like Transparency  Never Done ,and I am also “Go-To” People , so all of the thing it's pretty fit my values.  that’s why I want to join wayfair

(2) The interview experience was very impressive, I think I do my best in the interview, complete the coding test correctly, and quickly find the bug from the PHP code, you know I never had exeperience with PHP before, so I like this interview

How is the H1B policy? So Can we  make the H1B in second year?


exciting


If have any open position in the future,
